parameters.name: fields[departments]
parameters.description: Possible values are: `id`, `faculty_id`, `name`, `created_at`. For multiple options, separate them by comma.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Possible values are: `id`, `faculty_id`, `name`, `created_at`, `faculty.name`. For multiple options, separate them by comma.

parameters.name: fields[faculty]
parameters.description: Possible values are: `name`. For multiple options, separate them by comma.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Possible values are: `name`, `created_at`, `faculty.name`. For multiple options, separate them by comma. For descending order, add `-` at the front of the sort.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Possible values are: `faculty`. For multiple options, separate them by comma. For descending order, add `-` at the front of the include.

started_at.description: If no timezone provided, assumed to be in UTC

ended_at.description: If no timezone provided, assumed to be in UTC

has_condition.description: This field is only for `multiple_choice` and `checkboxes` question type.

options.description: This field is only for `multiple_choice` and `checkboxes` question type.

from_label.description: This field is only for `linear_scale` question type.

from_value.description: This field is only for `linear_scale` question type.

to_label.description: This field is only for `linear_scale` question type.

to_value.description: This field is only for `linear_scale` question type.

unit_type.description:
For `admin` and `tracer_team` role, this field must be `institutional`.
For `major_team` role, this field must be `major`.
For `head_of_unit` role, this field allows for all options.

unit_id.description:
For `faculty` unit_type, this field must be id from faculties.
For `major` unit_type, this field must be id from majors.
For `institutional` role, this field must be `null`.

started_at.description: If no timezone provided, assumed to be in UTC
